sentences.en: It is your treat, but you shouldn't stodge yourself with roast duck and beef stew, John.
sentences.cn: 约翰,虽说是你请客, 也用不着对烤鸭和炖牛肉狼吞虎咽呀.

sentences.en: You shouldn't stodge yourself with roast duck and beef stew, John.
sentences.cn: 约翰,你不要让烤鸭和炖牛肉把你的胃口吃倒了.

words.tran_cn: 乏味的食物；乏味的作品；贪吃的人；油腻的食物

trans.tran_en: heavy food that makes you feel full very quickly
